showLoad.help: Show the graph of the load distribution if specified.

renderRaw.help: Render the raw curves if specified.

runFltk.help: Run gmsh with the generated script if specified.

skipWrite.help: Skip writing the generated script if specified.

writeVTK.help: Write the generated VTK file if specified.

inputPath.help: The path to write the input files

outputPath.help: The path to write the output files

logPath.help: The path to write the log files
